metadata.title: CVE-2022-20482 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In createNotificationChannel of NotificationManager.java, there is apossible way to make the device unusable and require factory reset due toresource exhaustion. This could lead to local denial of service with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-240422263

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
